text:
Thank you for all the messages,
n\0! You are...
REALLY into sending fan mail,
huh? I LOVED the prezzies you
sent too, so here's something
for you, from me!

I checked my mail when I got home,
and I could NOT believe how many
messages I had! I got super excited
and read every single one! The
prezzies were awesome too, so
I got YOU something in return!

I couldn't BELIEVE I got so many
letters at once! And you sent
along PREZZIES too?! SO COOL!
I got you something I thought
maybe you'd like too. Enjoy!

When did you find the time to write
all those messages?! I totes read
every last one of them! And thank
you for them all! But...wow.

I saw how many letters I had in my
mailbox and thought it was a joke!
But they were all from you! I knew
right then that you were helping me
practice for dealing with mountains
of fan mail! Thank yooooou!

I just read all the notes you sent
me! Thank you SO MUCH! I'm, you
know, SUPER into getting mail
right now. ESPECIALLY from you,
n\0! I'll treasure
them forever and ever and ever!
